Definition: Given a phrase describing the relationship between two words, extract the words and the lexical relationship between them. The relation has to be of the type 'MemberOf', "MadeOf', SYnonym', 'Entails' or 'HasA'. The output should have the format: word2: word1: word2. The output should have the format: word1:word2. Understand the relationship between them. The output should have the format: word3: word1 relation word2.

Positive Examples.input: blow can be used with the same meaning of strike
air can be used with the same meaning of atmosphere

Instances.input: build is able with the same meaning of construction
book can have or can contain picture
action can be used with the same meaning of performance
apple can have or can contain seed
bolt can be characterized by tight

baby can be used as the opposite of adult
